docs.lead_paragraph: DARIEN, Conn., June 23 -- Contradictory and controversial accounts of a recent sensitivity - training session for public school teachers here have set off an emotional debate over the values of sex education.
docs.abstract: Controversy develops over sensitivity training session for ps teachers, Darien, Conn, seeking to teach sex educ courses after participant in 'human relations laboratory' called sessions dangerous because they include petting, touching and stroking; 22 teachers in program defend courses
docs.snippet: DARIEN, Conn., June 23 -- Contradictory and controversial accounts of a recent sensitivity - training session for public school teachers here have set off an emotional debate over the values of sex education.

byline.original: By LACEY FOSBURGHSpecial to The New York Times
